Chattem | Happi
s: March 27, 2024 - Sanofi Aventis has completed the acquisition of Chattem, Inc., pulling its well-known personal care brands like Gold Bond, Balmex and BullFrog—as well as Allegra (the main thrust behind the French drug company’s purchase of Chattem in the first place)—into its consumer healthcare business.
